title: (2) Hal Chase T205s - Sovereign and Sweet Caporal
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: (2) Hal Chase T205s - Sovereign and Sweet Caporal
posts.post_content:
Have two Hal Chase T205s for sale individually. Both are the frame extends variation.

#1 - This one looks cleaner. It has some light creasing, but no paper loss, writing, etc. and also has a Sovereign Back ($45.00)

#2 - This one has some more rounding around corners and also has light creasing. But also no paper loss, writing, etc. and is a Sweet Caporal Back ($30.00)

Prices are delivered via PPFF payment.
